mappings.mapping_reason: AVM contains a dedicated Resource Group module matching azurerm_resource_group.
mappings.mapping_details: Attributes and resource semantics for azurerm_resource_group are a direct match to the avm-res-resources-resourcegroup module.

mappings.mapping_reason: AVM module avm-res-web-serverfarm explicitly provides App Service Plan (azurerm_service_plan) support.
mappings.mapping_details: All key attributes and semantics of azurerm_service_plan are directly supported by the AVM module.

target_module.name: avm-res-web-site
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Web/Function App

mappings.mapping_reason: AVM module avm-res-web-site includes support for azurerm_linux_web_app resource.
mappings.mapping_details: Module supports full lifecycle management of Linux Web Apps including dependency on the service plan.

target_module.name: avm-res-web-site
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Web/Function App

mappings.mapping_reason: AVM module avm-res-web-site includes support for azurerm_linux_web_app resource.
mappings.mapping_details: Module supports full lifecycle management of Linux Web Apps including dependency on the service plan.

target_module.name: avm-res-operationalinsights-workspace
target_module.description: Azure Log Analytics Workspace AVM Module

mappings.mapping_reason: AVM module avm-res-operationalinsights-workspace manages Log Analytics Workspace resources.
mappings.mapping_details: Inputs and outputs of azurerm_log_analytics_workspace are covered in the AVM module.

target_module.name: avm-res-insights-component
target_module.description: AVM Terraform Module for Application Insights

mappings.mapping_details: Key attributes map 1:1 and integration with Log Analytics is also supported.

target_module.name: avm-res-keyvault-vault
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Key Vault

mappings.mapping_details: AVM module supports full lifecycle of Key Vaults and access policies. Child resource azurerm_key_vault_secret may be managed within child modules or as an additional resource.

target_module.name: avm-res-keyvault-vault
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Key Vault

mappings.mapping_reason: The key vault secret can be managed as part of the parent vault AVM module inputs, but may also require custom handling for secret updates.
mappings.mapping_details: AVM module can create secrets if provided as input, otherwise may require direct azurerm_key_vault_secret resource outside the AVM module.

target_module.name: avm-res-documentdb-databaseaccount
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for CosmosDB Database Account

mappings.mapping_reason: avm-res-documentdb-databaseaccount manages azurerm_cosmosdb_account and its associated SQL databases, containers, triggers, procedures, etc.
mappings.mapping_details: Module supports parent/child resource relationship, so child azurerm_cosmosdb_sql_database and azurerm_cosmosdb_sql_container resources are handled via AVM module inputs.

target_module.name: avm-res-documentdb-databaseaccount
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for CosmosDB Database Account

mappings.mapping_reason: Child Cosmos DB SQL databases are managed via inputs to the parent CosmosDB AVM module.
mappings.mapping_details: azurerm_cosmosdb_sql_database resources can be managed as part of the database account resource set within AVM.

target_module.name: avm-res-documentdb-databaseaccount
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for CosmosDB Database Account

mappings.mapping_reason: Child Cosmos DB SQL containers are managed via inputs to the parent CosmosDB AVM module.
mappings.mapping_details: azurerm_cosmosdb_sql_container resources are mapped to AVM module as part of the database account's configuration.

target_module.name: avm-res-web-site
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Web/Function App

mappings.mapping_reason: This diagnostic setting is typically managed as part of the parent AVM web app module configuration.
mappings.mapping_details: Diagnostic settings for web apps are exposed as input parameters for AVM module avm-res-web-site; no separate standalone module for azurerm_monitor_diagnostic_setting is required unless more advanced/custom monitoring use-cases exist.

target_module.name: avm-res-web-site
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Web/Function App

mappings.mapping_reason: This diagnostic setting is typically managed as part of the parent AVM web app module configuration.
mappings.mapping_details: Diagnostic settings for web apps are exposed as input parameters for AVM module avm-res-web-site; no separate standalone module for azurerm_monitor_diagnostic_setting is required unless more advanced/custom monitoring use-cases exist.

target_module.name: avm-res-documentdb-databaseaccount
target_module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for CosmosDB Database Account

mappings.mapping_reason: azurerm_monitor_diagnostic_setting for CosmosDB account is handled via input/outputs in the parent CosmosDB AVM module.
mappings.mapping_details: No standalone AVM module for diagnostic setting is required; these settings are integrated with the resource AVM module.
